# jquery.hoverGrid A simple, lightweight jQuery plugin for creating a grid of images which when hovered reveals a caption ## Installation Include script *after* the jQuery library If you want the default styles also include the css, if not feel free to style it as you see wish! ## Usage create the html markup for the grid in your file

Some Title

This is a caption to end all captions

apply the js, example: Full Example Check out our [github-page] (http://carlwoodhouse.github.com/jquery.hoverGrid) ## Options **itemClass** - Define a class for the grid items closeButton: '.alternate-class' *Default: '.item'* **zoom** - Define how much the animation zooms on hover zoom: 2 *Default: 1.2* **move** - efine how much the animation moves on hover move: -20 *Default: -20* ## Authors * [Carl Woodhouse](https://github.com/carlwoodhouse) * [Mark Searle](https://github.com/marksearle)
name: Jquery.hovergrid
tagline: A simple, lightweight jQuery plugin for creating a grid of images which when hovered reveals a caption
